title: Chapter 687 - Su Yi’S Sword
body:
Chapter 687 - Su Yi’S Sword

The grand elder!

When Dongguo Feng saw the yellow-robed elder leading the group, his pupils constricted, and he seemed to realize something. His brow silently furrowed.

The yellow-robed elder was called Dongguo Hai. He was a grand elder of the Dongguo Family, a high-level authority figure.

The six others with him were all prominent members of the clan too.

When the group arrived at the scene of the battle and saw the disheveled, blood-covered Dongguo Feng, they were all stunned.

“Feng’er, you… You actually lost?” exclaimed Dongguo Hai.

As he spoke, he and his companions scanned the area. All of them looked at Su Yi.

When they saw that Su Yi didn’t have so much as a single hair out of place, their expressions darkened. They’d already picked up several hints.

Dongguo Feng said calmly, “In competitions of the Grand Dao, victory and defeat are commonplace. I just don’t know what you’ve come here to do?”

Dongguo Hai calmed himself down, a conflicted look on his face. “The family head was concerned that something unexpected would happen, so he sent us over. I wouldn’t have guessed it, but something unexpected really did happen…”

The other Dongguo Family higher-ups...
